hypothesis_content.title: Labor Data Volatility Compression Trade
hypothesis_content.statement: When US labor data surprises >1 standard deviation from expectations, BTC implied volatility will compress relative to S&P 500 VIX by -15% within 2 hours post-announcement, as crypto markets price macro shocks faster than traditional markets due to lower liquidity friction.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Crypto's continuous trading and global participant base allows faster price discovery. Large macro shocks get arbitraged quicker than in traditional markets where ETF flows/ market makers create friction.
entry_conditions: Non-farm payrolls/Unemployment data release within past 15 minutes
Data surprise >1 std dev from Bloomberg consensus
BTC 1-hour realized volatility > ETH 1-hour realized volatility

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC 24h IV/VIX ratio decreases by 15% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC 24h IV/VIX ratio increases by 8% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC IV consistently expands relative to VIX post-macro surprises across 10+ events
